title: The Ozark Mountains
prompt: A weathered county road disappearing into forested hills under soft morning light, with sparse farmsteads and a distant church steeple barely visible through mist; capture the road from ground level to emphasize isolation and distance, with muted greens and browns dominating, shot in documentary style with natural grain and slightly desaturated color to convey both the terrain's rugged character and the quiet absence of visibility or institutional presence.
